Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Wendell Cox (HOU)...
Injured on 4/6/2015 with a Sprained Wrist, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/2015, off Gerald Henriquez (CHI)...
Injured on 9/18/2017 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2018, hitting .458 with 0 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2018, hitting .484 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2018, hitting .359 with 4 HR, 26 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/2/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $3,655,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Kansas City on 4/19/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2019, hitting .520 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
